name: Cat Burglar (Hawtori, YaySushi, Avnapurna)
description:
You control a cat burglar,  running around causing havoc. 

Move cat on the start screen to start the game

Your primary goal is to steal jewelry hidden at the current level. Once you find 4 copies, you will move on to the next level. 

Keep in mind there are enemies walking around. If they spot you, they will follow you. DON'T GET CAUGHT!!! and keep in mind you can get away by leaving their sight 

You have typical walking abilities (WASD or ARROW KEYS)

There is an additional dash move (SPACE)

gg
